definition: to seize the opportunity/to strike while the iron is hot
four horse military chariot (archaic)/four (archaic)/generic term for history books
to ride/to mount/to make use of/to avail oneself of/to take advantage of/to multiply (math.)/Buddhist sect or creed

sentences.english: Freeing from the old ideas and seizing the opportunities to advance, starting to get new achievements of the utilization of foreign funds.
sentences.chinese: 解放思想，乘勢而上，開始利用外資工作的嶄新業績。

sentences.chinese: 蘭開斯特家族乘勢再起，亨利成爲其重奪王位的旗幟。
